snippet: Ragnar Kjartansson, whose installation “The Visitors” comes to Chelsea next month, has spent more than a decade exploring the potential of repetitive performance to yield unexpected meanings.
abstract: Video installation The Visitors by Ragnar Kjartansson features himself and other musicians playing various instruments in different rooms of old mansion and repeatedly singing the same refrain; Kjartansson has spent more than a decade exploring the potential of repetitive performance to yield unexpected meanings.
lead_paragraph: Ragnar Kjartansson, whose installation “The Visitors” comes to Chelsea next month, has spent more than a decade exploring the potential of repetitive performance to yield unexpected meanings.
